title: 日本ダービーにむけて

text_block_list.text: On the day of the 'Japanese Derby'. In the underground passageway, Rice Shower and Mihono Bourbon exchange a passionate handshake——
Matikanetannhauser watches the scene from hiding once again. To the question, 'Why do you always hide?'——
Matikanetannhauser watches the scene from hiding once again. To the question, 'Why do you always hide?'——
She answers matter-of-factly that it would be strange for an ordinary Umamusume to mix in with them.
'Or rather, why does the chairman have expectations for an ordinary me like this...?' Such faint doubts arise as well——
The decisive battle to determine the number one of the generation, the 'Japanese Derby', begins...!
